description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget screen named 'ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen', which serves as a stub or placeholder UI for managing locations and time slots within a manager flow of a healthy meal ordering platform. It includes a scaffold with an app bar, a list view of placeholder items, and styled header and row components.

classes.name: ManagerLocationsTimeSlotsScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the 'Locations & Time Slots' management screen with a header and placeholder list items.

classes.name: _SectionHeader
classes.description: A private stateless widget that renders a header with a gradient background, icon, and title text for the section.

classes.name: _Row
classes.description: A private stateless widget that displays a styled row with an icon and customizable text, used as placeholders.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for each widget class, constructs the UI layout using Flutter widgets.
